languages.text: {n}Решетка {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}, вмонтированного в лицо Вигдис, издает короткий хрип, обозначающий смешок.{/n} "Несомненно, но не только. Еще вас ждет прием — помимо иных высокородных гостей, на него прибудут достопочтимые Вольные Торговцы Каллигос Винтерскейл и Инцендия Чорда. Для Даргонуса будет большой честью принимать визит сразу трех благороднейших династий".

traits.locale_text: {n}Решетка вокса, вмонтированного в лицо Вигдис, издает короткий хрип, обозначающий смешок.{/n} "Несомненно, но не только. Еще вас ждет прием гостей — высокопоставленные гости прибудут, чтобы поздравить вас".

languages.text: {n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."
languages.original_text: {n}Решетка {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}, вмонтированного в лицо Вигдис, издает короткий хрип, обозначающий смешок.{/n} "Несомненно, но не только. Еще вас ждет прием — помимо иных высокородных гостей, на него прибудут достопочтимые Вольные Торговцы Каллигос Винтерскейл и Инцендия Чорда. Для Даргонуса будет большой честью принимать визит сразу трех благороднейших династий".

traits.locale_text: {n}The grille of the vox built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There is also a reception — distinguished guests will arrive to congratulate you."

{n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

{n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

{n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

{n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスの顔が組み込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}の格子が短い音を立て、クスクスと笑うような音を放つ。{/n}「それは確かにそうですが、全員との握手を求められてはいません。祝賀会もありますので、他の高貴なゲストと同様、著名な自由開拓者であるカリゴス・ウィンタースケールとインセンディア・チョーダも出席されます。高名な三王朝が一堂に会する機会をダルゴナスが提供できるとは、実に光栄なことです」
languages.original_text: {n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスの顔が組み込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}の格子が短い音を立て、クスクスと笑うような音を放つ。{/n}「それは確かにそうですが、全員との握手を求められてはいません。祝賀会もありますので、他の高貴なゲストと同様、著名な自由開拓者であるカリゴス・ウィンタースケールとインセンディア・チョーダも出席されます。高名な三王朝が一堂に会する機会をダルゴナスが提供できるとは、実に光栄なことです」

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯脸上的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}格栅发出一阵滋滋声，似乎是她发出了一串轻笑。{/n}“这一步恐怕肯定是少不了，但远远不止这些。您还要举行一场欢迎宴会，招待尊贵的行商浪人卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔、因森蒂娅·库尔达与其他贵客。能够同时宴请三个鼎盛的行商浪人王朝，这将会是达戈努斯无上的荣耀。”
languages.original_text: {n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯脸上的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}格栅发出一阵滋滋声，似乎是她发出了一串轻笑。{/n}“这一步恐怕肯定是少不了，但远远不止这些。您还要举行一场欢迎宴会，招待尊贵的行商浪人卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔、因森蒂娅·库尔达与其他贵客。能够同时宴请三个鼎盛的行商浪人王朝，这将会是达戈努斯无上的荣耀。”

languages.text: {n}La rejilla del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} integrado en la cara de Vigdis suelta el tintineo de una risa.{/n} «Desde luego, pero hay algunos aspectos más. También habrá una recepción: además de otros visitantes nobles, los distinguidos Comerciantes Independientes Calligos Winterscale e Incendia Chorda estarán presentes. Será un gran honor para Dargonus recibir a tres ilustres dinastías a un mismo tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}La rejilla del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} integrado en la cara de Vigdis suelta el tintineo de una risa.{/n} «Desde luego, pero hay algunos aspectos más. También habrá una recepción: además de otros visitantes nobles, los distinguidos Comerciantes Independientes Calligos Winterscale e Incendia Chorda estarán presentes. Será un gran honor para Dargonus recibir a tres ilustres dinastías a un mismo tiempo».

languages.text: {n}La grille du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} incrusté dans le visage de Vigdis laisse échapper un grincement en guise de rire.{/n} « En effet, mais ce n'est pas tout. Il y aura une réception qui rassemblera un certain nombre d'invités de la noblesse, parmi lesquels les libres-marchands Calligos Winterscale et Incendia Chorda. Ce sera un grand honneur pour Dargonus d'accueillir trois illustres dynasties en même temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}La grille du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} incrusté dans le visage de Vigdis laisse échapper un grincement en guise de rire.{/n} « En effet, mais ce n'est pas tout. Il y aura une réception qui rassemblera un certain nombre d'invités de la noblesse, parmi lesquels les libres-marchands Calligos Winterscale et Incendia Chorda. Ce sera un grand honneur pour Dargonus d'accueillir trois illustres dynasties en même temps. »

languages.text: {n}Das Auslassgitter des {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} in Vigdis' Gesicht klappert kurz, was ein Kichern darstellen soll.{/n} "Das stimmt schon mal, aber damit ist es nicht getan. Es wird auch einen Empfang geben – und andere noble Gäste wie die geschätzten Freihändler Calligos Winterzunder und Incendia Chorda. Es ist für Dargonus eine große Ehre, drei berühmte Dynastien auf einmal zu bewirten."
languages.original_text: {n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Auslassgitter des {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} in Vigdis' Gesicht klappert kurz, was ein Kichern darstellen soll.{/n} "Das stimmt schon mal, aber damit ist es nicht getan. Es wird auch einen Empfang geben – und andere noble Geste wie die geschätzten Freihändler Calligos Winterzunder und Incendia Chorda. Es ist für Dargonus eine große Ehre, drei berühmte Dynastien auf einmal zu bewirten."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis'in yüzüne yerleştirilen {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} ızgarasından, kıkırdadığını işaret eden kısa bir takırtı çıkıyor.{/n} "Onlar farz, tabii dahası da var. Asil konukların yanı sıra seçkin Hür Tacirler Calligos Winterscale ile İncendia Chorda'nın da katılacağı bir merasim düzenlenecek. Aynı anda üç şanlı hanedana ev sahipliği yapmak, Dargonus için büyük bir onur olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}The grille of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into Vigdis's face lets out a short rattle that indicates a chuckle.{/n} "That much is certain, but that's not all there is to it. There will also be a reception — as well as other noble guests, the distinguished Rogue Traders Calligos Winterscale and Incendia Chorda will be in attendance. It will be a great honour for Dargonus to host three illustrious dynasties at once."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis'in yüzüne yerleştirilen {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} ızgarasından, kıkırdama emaresi kısa bir takırtı çıkıyor.{/n} "Onlar farz ama bu kadarla kalmıyor. Ayrıca diğer asil konukların yanı sıra seçkin Hür Tacirler Calligos Winterscale ile İncendia Chorda'nın da katılacağı bir karşılama yapılacak. Aynı anda üç şanlı hanedana ev sahipliği yapmak, Dargonus için büyük bir onur olacak."
